description: Life on the road is filled with obstacles. Do you have the juice to go from gearjammer to boss man in the trucking business? Climb in the can and find out!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce FX5700, ATI Radeon 9600, Intel GMA X3000 or better (requires TnL and Shader Model 2.0 support) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 3.1 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce FX5700, ATI Radeon 9600, Intel GMA X3000 or better (requires TnL and Shader Model 2.0 support) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
